description: Skills for developing WHMCS Domain Registrar Modules.

common_parameters.Description: The client ID who owns the domain
The unique ID of the domain
eg. `yourdomain`
eg. `.com`
The registration term for the domain (1-10 years)
Present only for incoming domain transfer orders (Transfers only)
First Nameserver (Registrations, Transfers and Nameserver Updates only)
Second Nameserver
Third Nameserver
Fourth Nameserver
Fifth Nameserver
First name and last name combined
State code eg. TX
State name eg. Texas
Postcode/Zip code
Country code eg. GB
Country name eg. United Kingdom
Phone number as the user provided it
Country code determined based on country
Format: +CC.xxxxxxxxxxxx
An array of additional registrant information fields and their values
State code eg. TX
State name eg. Texas
Postcode/Zip code
eg. GB
Phone number as the user provided it
Format: +CC.xxxxxxxxxxxx
True/false for if DNS Management add-on is active
True/false for if Email Forwarding add-on is active
True/false for if ID Protection add-on is active
True if premium domain orders are enabled in WHMCS (Registration/Transfers only)
The cost price fetched at the time of the order being placed
True if domain is within the renewal grace period. Available in the module renewal function only
True if the domain is within the redemption grace period. Available in the module renewal function only
The language code for the domain.
The Punycode version of the domain name.
The SLD with the Punycode domain name.
The TLD with the Punycode domain name.
Whether the domain is an IDN.

functions.name: RegisterDomain
functions.description: Called when the registration of a new domain is initiated within WHMCS.

functions.name: TransferDomain
functions.description: Called when a domain transfer request is initiated within WHMCS.

functions.name: RenewDomain
functions.description: Called when a request to renew a domain is initiated within WHMCS.

functions.name: GetDomainInformation
functions.description: Called when a domain is viewed within WHMCS. Recommended instead of GetNameservers and GetRegistrarLock in WHMCS 7.6 and later.

functions.name: GetEmailForwarding
functions.description: Called when Email Forwarding is displayed within WHMCS.

functions.name: SaveEmailForwarding
functions.description: Called when changes to Email Forwarding are submitted.

functions.name: GetNameservers
functions.description: Called when a domain is viewed within WHMCS. It can return up to 5 nameservers that are set for the domain.

functions.name: SaveNameservers
functions.description: Called when a change is submitted for a domains nameservers.

functions.name: GetRegistrarLock
functions.description: Called when a domains details are viewed within WHMCS. It should return the current lock status of a domain.

functions.name: SaveRegistrarLock
functions.description: Called when the lock status setting is toggled within WHMCS.

functions.name: GetContactDetails
functions.description: Called when the WHOIS information is displayed within WHMCS.

functions.name: SaveContactDetails
functions.description: Called when revised WHOIS information is submitted.

functions.name: ResendIRTPVerificationEmail
functions.description: Called when a request is made to resend the IRTP contact verification emails.

functions.name: GetDNS
functions.description: Called when the DNS Host Records are requested to be viewed within WHMCS.

functions.name: SaveDNS
functions.description: Called when any changes to DNS Host Records information is submitted.

functions.name: IDProtectToggle
functions.description: Called when the ID Protection setting is toggled on or off.

functions.name: GetEPPCode
functions.description: Called when the EPP Code is requested for a transfer out.

functions.name: ReleaseDomain
functions.description: Called when a domain release is requested (eg. UK IPSTag Changes).

functions.name: RegisterNameserver
functions.description: Called when a child nameserver registration request comes from WHMCS.

functions.name: ModifyNameserver
functions.description: Called when a child nameserver modification request comes from WHMCS.

functions.name: DeleteNameserver
functions.description: Called when a child nameserver deletion request comes from WHMCS.

functions.name: RequestDelete
functions.description: Called when a domain deletion request comes from WHMCS.

functions.name: ClientArea
functions.description: Used to define module specific client area output. It accepts a return of HTML for display on the domain details page of the client area. Output via a template file within the module folder named "clientarea.tpl" is also possible. This function is discussed in more detail later on in the docs.

functions.name: ClientAreaCustomButtonArray
functions.description: Used to define custom functions that the module supports. Customers can invoke and run these from the client area. The functions can perform actions or product page output in the client area. Example usages for this are to provide domain management pages, bandwidth reporting pages, etc...

functions.name: ClientAreaAllowedFunctions
functions.description: Like the above, used to define custom functions. These are functions that customers can invoke, but are not shown as buttons by default. (i.e. custom client area output will invoke them).

functions.name: Sync
functions.description: Called when a domain name's expiry date and status change at registry level is requested for propagation into WHMCS. (i.e by the Domain Synchronization feature).

functions.name: TransferSync
functions.description: Called when the status of a domain transfer at registry level is requested for propagation into WHMCS. (i.e by the Domain Synchronization feature).

functions.name: GetTldPricing
functions.description: Called when the importation and synchronising of TLD pricing, into WHMCS, from a registrar is requested. (i.e by the Registrar TLD & Pricing Sync Utility).
